languages.text: "{name} фон Валанциус, двадцат{mf|ый|ая} в своем роду, Вольный Торговец, хранитель{mf||ница} священного {g|Encyclopedia:Warrant}Патента{/g} и правитель{mf||ница} {g|Encyclopedia:KoronusExpanse}Простора Коронус{/g} от системы Кранах до Перекрестка Сотни Снов — приветствую вас!"

traits.locale_text: "{name} фон Валанциус, двадцат{mf|ый|ая} в своем роду, Вольный Торговец, хранитель{mf||ница} священного Патента и правитель{mf||ница} Простора Коронус от системы Кранах до Перекрестка Сотни Снов — привестствую вас!" {n}Грузный мужчина склоняется в учтивом поклоне.{/n}

languages.text: "{name} von Valancius, twentieth in {mf|his|her} line, Rogue Trader, keeper of the sacred {g|Encyclopedia:Warrant}Warrant{/g}, and ruler of the {g|Encyclopedia:KoronusExpanse}Koronus Expanse{/g} from the Cranach System to the Hundred Dreams Crossroads — I bid you welcome!"
languages.original_text: "{name} фон Валанциус, двадцат{mf|ый|ая} в своем роду, Вольный Торговец, хранитель{mf||ница} священного {g|Encyclopedia:Warrant}Патента{/g} и правитель{mf||ница} {g|Encyclopedia:KoronusExpanse}Простора Коронус{/g} от системы Кранах до Перекрестка Сотни Снов — приветствую вас!"

traits.locale_text: "{name} von Valancius, twentieth in {mf|his|her} line, Rogue Trader, keeper of the sacred Warrant, and ruler of the Koronus Expanse from the Cranach system to the Hundred Dreams Crossroad — I greet you!" {n}The stout man bows with reverence.{/n}

"{name} von Valancius, twentieth in {mf|his|her} line, Rogue Trader, keeper of the sacred Warrant, and ruler of the Koronus Expanse from the Cranach system to the Hundred Dreams Crossroad — I greet you!" {n}The stout man bows with reverence.{/n}

"{name} von Valancius, twentieth in {mf|his|her} line, Rogue Trader, keeper of the sacred {g|Encyclopedia:Warrant}Warrant{/g}, and ruler of the {g|Encyclopedia:KoronusExpanse}Koronus Expanse{/g} from the Cranach system to the Hundred Dreams Crossroads — I bid you welcome!"

"{name} von Valancius, twentieth in {mf|his|her} line, Rogue Trader, keeper of the sacred {g|Encyclopedia:Warrant}Warrant{/g}, and ruler of the {g|Encyclopedia:KoronusExpanse}Koronus Expanse{/g} from the Cranach system to the Hundred Dreams Crossroads — I bid you welcome!"

"{name} von Valancius, twentieth in {mf|his|her} line, Rogue Trader, keeper of the sacred {g|Encyclopedia:Warrant}Warrant{/g}, and ruler of the {g|Encyclopedia:KoronusExpanse}Koronus Expanse{/g} from the Cranach System to the Hundred Dreams Crossroads — I bid you welcome!"

languages.text: “{name}·冯-瓦兰修斯，冯·瓦兰修斯家族第二十代行商浪人，神圣{g|Encyclopedia:Warrant}授状{/g}的守护者，以及{g|Encyclopedia:KoronusExpanse}科罗努斯扩区{/g}从克兰纳克星系到百梦岔口的统治者。欢迎您的到来！”
languages.original_text: "{name} von Valancius, twentieth in {mf|his|her} line, Rogue Trader, keeper of the sacred {g|Encyclopedia:Warrant}Warrant{/g}, and ruler of the {g|Encyclopedia:KoronusExpanse}Koronus Expanse{/g} from the Cranach System to the Hundred Dreams Crossroads — I bid you welcome!"

traits.locale_text: “{name}·冯-瓦兰修斯，冯·瓦兰修斯家族第二十代行商浪人，神圣{g|Encyclopedia:Warrant}许可证{/g}的守护者，以及{g|Encyclopedia:KoronusExpanse}科罗努斯扩区{/g}从克兰纳克星系到百梦岔口的统治者。欢迎您的到来！”

languages.text: «{name} von Valancius, vigésim{mf|o|a} de su linaje, Comerciante Independiente, portador{mf||a} de la sagrada {g|Encyclopedia:Warrant}Patente{/g} y gobernante de la {g|Encyclopedia:KoronusExpanse}Extensión de Koronus{/g} desde el sistema Cranach a la Encrucijada de los Cien Sueños, ¡sea bienvenid{mf|o|a}!».
languages.original_text: "{name} von Valancius, twentieth in {mf|his|her} line, Rogue Trader, keeper of the sacred {g|Encyclopedia:Warrant}Warrant{/g}, and ruler of the {g|Encyclopedia:KoronusExpanse}Koronus Expanse{/g} from the Cranach System to the Hundred Dreams Crossroads — I bid you welcome!"

traits.locale_text: «{name} von Valancius, vigésim{mf|o|a} de su linaje, Comerciante Independiente, portador{mf||a} de la sagrada {g|Encyclopedia:Warrant}Patente{/g} y gobernante de la {g|Encyclopedia:KoronusExpanse}Extensión de Koronus{/g} desde el sistema Cranach a la Encrucijada de los Cien Sueños, ¡sea bienvenid{mf|o|a}!».

languages.text: 「{name}フォン・ヴァランシウス家の20代目当主、自由開拓者、聖なる{g|Encyclopedia:Warrant}令状{/g}の保持者、クラナッハ星系から百夢の十字路にわたる{g|Encyclopedia:KoronusExpanse}コロヌス・エクスパンス{/g}の支配者よ―歓迎いたします！」
languages.original_text: "{name} von Valancius, twentieth in {mf|his|her} line, Rogue Trader, keeper of the sacred {g|Encyclopedia:Warrant}Warrant{/g}, and ruler of the {g|Encyclopedia:KoronusExpanse}Koronus Expanse{/g} from the Cranach System to the Hundred Dreams Crossroads — I bid you welcome!"

traits.locale_text: 「{name}フォン・ヴァランシウス家の20代目当主、自由開拓者、聖なる{g|Encyclopedia:Warrant}令状{/g}の保持者、クラナッハ星系から百夢の十字路にわたる{g|Encyclopedia:KoronusExpanse}コロヌス・エクスパンス{/g}の支配者よ―歓迎いたします！」

languages.text: "{name} von Valancius, {mf|Zwanzigster in seiner Linie, Freihändler, Hüter|Zwanzigste in ihrer Linie, Freihändlerin, Hüterin} des heiligen {g|Encyclopedia:Warrant}Handelsbriefs{/g} und {mf|Herrscher|Herrscherin} der {g|Encyclopedia:KoronusExpanse}Koronus-Ausdehnung{/g} vom Cranach-System bis zum Knotenpunkt der hundert Träume – ich heiße Euch willkommen!"
languages.original_text: "{name} von Valancius, twentieth in {mf|his|her} line, Rogue Trader, keeper of the sacred {g|Encyclopedia:Warrant}Warrant{/g}, and ruler of the {g|Encyclopedia:KoronusExpanse}Koronus Expanse{/g} from the Cranach System to the Hundred Dreams Crossroads — I bid you welcome!"

traits.locale_text: "{name} von Valancius, {mf|Zwanzigster in seiner Linie, Freihändler, Hüter|Zwanzigste in ihrer Linie, Freihändlerin, Hüterin} des heiligen {g|Encyclopedia:Warrant}Handelsbriefs{/g} und {mf|Herrscher|Herrscherin} der {g|Encyclopedia:KoronusExpanse}Koronus-Ausdehnung{/g} vom Cranach-System bis zum Knotenpunkt der hundert Träume – ich heiße Euch willkommen!"

languages.text: « {name} von Valancius, vingtième du nom, {mf|libre-marchand|libre-marchande}, {mf|gardien|gardienne} de la {g|Encyclopedia:Warrant}lettre de marque{/g} sacrée, {mf|souverain|souveraine} des {g|Encyclopedia:KoronusExpanse}Étendues de Koronus{/g} depuis le système de Cranach jusqu'au Croisement des Cent rêves, je vous souhaite la bienvenue ! »
languages.original_text: "{name} von Valancius, twentieth in {mf|his|her} line, Rogue Trader, keeper of the sacred {g|Encyclopedia:Warrant}Warrant{/g}, and ruler of the {g|Encyclopedia:KoronusExpanse}Koronus Expanse{/g} from the Cranach System to the Hundred Dreams Crossroads — I bid you welcome!"

traits.locale_text: « {name} von Valancius, vingtième du nom, {mf|libre-marchand|libre-marchande}, {mf|gardien|gardienne} de la {g|Encyclopedia:Warrant}lettre de marque{/g} sacrée, {mf|souverain|souveraine} des {g|Encyclopedia:KoronusExpanse}Étendues de Koronus{/g} depuis le système de Cranach jusqu'au Croisement des Cent rêves, je vous souhaite la bienvenue ! »

languages.text: "Hanedanlığın yirminci Hür Tacir'i, kutsal {g|Encyclopedia:Warrant}Ruhsatname'nin{/g} hamili ve Cranach Sistemi'nden Yüz Rüya Kesişimi'ne {g|Encyclopedia:KoronusExpanse}Koronus Enginliği'nin{/g} hükümdarı {name} von Valancius, size hoş geldiniz diyorum!"
languages.original_text: "{name} von Valancius, twentieth in {mf|his|her} line, Rogue Trader, keeper of the sacred {g|Encyclopedia:Warrant}Warrant{/g}, and ruler of the {g|Encyclopedia:KoronusExpanse}Koronus Expanse{/g} from the Cranach System to the Hundred Dreams Crossroads — I bid you welcome!"

traits.locale_text: "{name} von Valancius, hanedanlığın yirminci Hür Tacir'i, kutsal {g|Encyclopedia:Warrant}Ruhsatname{/g}'nin taşıyıcısı ve Cranach Sistemi'nden Yüz Rüya Kesişimi'ne {g|Encyclopedia:KoronusExpanse}Koronus Enginliği{/g}'nin hükümdarı, size hoş geldiniz diyorum!"
